com.pilot.jword.view
Class FragmentCollection

java.lang.Object
  com.pilot.jword.view.FragmentCollection

public class FragmentCollection
extends java.lang.Object

Collection for Fragment objects. It has some usable methods for handling pagination.

Constructor Summary

          constructor

addChildFragments

public void addChildFragments(FragmentCollection childFragments,
                              Fragmentable view,
                              int offsetX,
                              int offsetY,
                              int minimumHeight)
adds child fragments by creating a parent Fragment (of the given view) for each

Parameters:
childFragments - list of child fragments
view - parent view
offsetX - x offset of the first fragment
offsetY - y offset of the first fragment
minimumHeight - minimum height of fragment
